Locale.Value:
Wondershare Filmora V12.3.4 released!

Color Correction:
1. New Color Correction algorithm: improved color correction algorithm and expanded parameter adjustment range, allowing for more natural color adjustments.
2. New Color Wheels: You can use three color wheels (Shadows, Midtones, and Highlights) to adjust color in your video clips.
3. Sharpen: Added “Sharpen” parameter, providing the option to make the video and image appear clearer or softer.
4. Effect Masks: New effect mask feature allows for applying effects only to the masked area.
5. LUT intensity: Added LUT new parameter for adjusting LUT intensity.
6. Before/After View: added the "Before/After View" feature in the previewer to compare your edited videos after color correction to your original.

Miscellaneous:
1. New effects: added a dozen of new transitions and effects.
2. Image Sequences: support for exporting image sequences, including PNG and JPG formats.
3. Cache Management: Added Cache Management in Preferences, supporting cache file cleaning and management.
4. Enhanced editing performance for a smoother experience
5. User-customed project templates can now be synced to Filmora Cloud for a backup
6. AI Image now supported
7. Improve browsing experience in the effect library
